page.title: 07POPULATION
page.content: This area is{sparsely populated}with no village as such, having only twelve main farms within its boundaries. Previously, there were many smaller farms and crofts, but because of mechanisation and greater labour costs, they became uneconomical to run as single units and have gradually been taken over by neighbouring farmers. Conversely, some farms, which were formerly part of a larger estate, have been bought by their tenants. Much of the population is{static. }In some cases two generations of a family are working on farms which have been owned by their ancestors since the last century.
